alert.note: Alert for Rooks (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 10:56PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Rooks County through 1145 PM CDT... At 1056 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Lenora to 8 miles north of Hill City. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Damar, Palco, Webster State Park and Zurich. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
